Class Medication

java.lang.Object
hms.Medication
public class Medication extends Object
The Medication class represents a medication item in the hospital management system. It includes details such as medication name, price, stock level, low stock alert level, and whether a low stock alert is active.

  • Constructor Details

    • Medication

      public Medication(String medicationName, int price, int stockLevel, int lowStockAlertLevel)
      Constructs a new Medication instance with the specified details. Initializes the stock level alert based on the stock level and low stock alert level.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication.
      price - The price of the medication.
      stockLevel - The current stock level.
      lowStockAlertLevel - The stock level at which to trigger a low stock alert.
